answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Mary, 
In addition to the responses you get from your survey here are a few documents on the Knowledge Network that relate to your survey. I hope you find them useful as you craft the policy for your local government. 
-Feral Cat Management Response Spreadsheet 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/305386
-Win-Win Strategies for Managing Homeless Cats 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/302474
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Mary Poole
text:
Dear ICMA Professionals:
I am the Animal Services Division Manager for Citrus Heights and completing a graduate research study on the topic on (Trap-Neuter-Return (TNR) polices for feral and stray cat management. I am hoping you all can assist me with the study by doing the survey linked below. The survey data is going to support development of TNR recommendations for the City. I am also utilizing the documents already available on this network to assist me with this project. 
If you are able to respond, please do so by February 7, 2014.
I am most appreciative of your assistance!
http://edu.surveygizmo.com/s3/1521420/Listserv-Survey 
Sincerely,
Mary
Mary Poole
Operations Manager
General Services Department
City of Citrus Heights
6237 Fountain Square Drive
Citrus Heights, CA 95621
(916) 727-4730 direct
(916) 727-1454 fax
mpoole@citrusheights.net
title: Animal Services - Feral and Stray Cat Management Policies
